summary: Sulu CMS Install with DDEV: Troubleshooting 403 Error

message.content: Hallo, in this folder you find a composer sulu/skeleton project in ddev on a mac. Please import Database and mak all routes to use this site unter url: https://sulu.ddev.site

content.text: I'll help you set up the Sulu project and configure it to work with the ddev URL. Let me first examine the project structure and then set up the necessary configuration.

content.content: Todos have been modified successfully. Ensure that you continue to use the todo list to track your progress. Please proceed with the current tasks if applicable

file.content:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<webspace xmlns="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace"
          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
          xsi:schemaLocation="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace-1.1.xsd">
    <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html how to configure your webspace-->

    <name>example.com</name>
    <key>example</key>

    <localizations>
        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/localization.html how to add new localizations -->
        <localization language="en" default="true"/>
    </localizations>

    <default-templates>
        <default-template type="page">default</default-template>
        <default-template type="home">homepage</default-template>
    </default-templates>

    <!-- See: https://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html#excluded-templates-optional
    <excluded-templates>
        <excluded-template>other</excluded-template>
    </excluded-templates>
    -->

    <templates>
        <template type="search">search/search</template>
        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/cookbook/custom-error-page.html how to create a custom error page -->
        <template type="error">error/error</template>
    </templates>

    <navigation>
        <contexts>
            <context key="main">
                <meta>
                    <title lang="en">Main Navigation</title>
                    <title lang="de">Hauptnavigation</title>
                </meta>
            </context>
        </contexts>
    </navigation>

    <portals>
        <portal>
            <name>example.com</name>
            <key>example</key>

            <environments>
                <environment type="prod">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="stage">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="test">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="dev">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
            </environments>
        </portal>
    </portals>
</webspace>

content.content:
Description:
  Loads data fixtures services tagged with "sulu.document_manager_fixture".

Usage:
  sulu:document:fixtures:load [options]

Options:
      --group=GROUP     The group which should be loaded. (multiple values allowed)
      --append          Append the data fixtures to the existing data - will not purge the workspace.
      --no-initialize   Do not run the repository initializers after purging the repository.
  -h, --help            Display help for the given command. When no command is given display help for the list command
  -q, --quiet           Do not output any message
  -V, --version         Display this application version
      --ansi|--no-ansi  Force (or disable --no-ansi) ANSI output
  -n, --no-interaction  Do not ask any interactive question
  -e, --env=ENV         The Environment name. [default: "dev"]
      --no-debug        Switch off debug mode.
      --profile         Enables profiling (requires debug).
  -v|vv|vvv, --verbose  Increase the verbosity of messages: 1 for normal output, 2 for more verbose output and 3 for debug

Help:
  The sulu:document:fixtures:load command loads data fixtures services
  tagged with "sulu.document_manager_fixture":
  
    bin/console sulu:document:fixtures:load
  
  You can also optionally specify the group of fixtures to load
  --group option:
  
    bin/console sulu:document:fixtures:load --group=GROUP1 --group=MyFixture
  
  If you want to append the fixtures instead of flushing the database first you
  can use the --append option:
  
    bin/console sulu:document:fixtures:load --append
  
  This command will also execute any registered Initializer classes after
  purging.

  can use the --append option:
  
    bin/console sulu:document:fixtures:load --append
  
  This command will also execute any registered Initializer classes after
  purging.

toolUseResult.originalFile:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<webspace xmlns="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace"
          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
          xsi:schemaLocation="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace-1.1.xsd">
    <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html how to configure your webspace-->

    <name>example.com</name>
    <key>example</key>

    <localizations>
        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/localization.html how to add new localizations -->
        <localization language="en" default="true"/>
    </localizations>

    <default-templates>
        <default-template type="page">default</default-template>
        <default-template type="home">homepage</default-template>
    </default-templates>

    <!-- See: https://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html#excluded-templates-optional
    <excluded-templates>
        <excluded-template>other</excluded-template>
    </excluded-templates>
    -->

    <templates>
        <template type="search">search/search</template>
        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/cookbook/custom-error-page.html how to create a custom error page -->
        <template type="error">error/error</template>
    </templates>

    <navigation>
        <contexts>
            <context key="main">
                <meta>
                    <title lang="en">Main Navigation</title>
                    <title lang="de">Hauptnavigation</title>
                </meta>
            </context>
        </contexts>
    </navigation>

    <portals>
        <portal>
            <name>example.com</name>
            <key>example</key>

            <environments>
                <environment type="prod">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="stage">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="test">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="dev">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
            </environments>
        </portal>
    </portals>
</webspace>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<webspace xmlns="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace"
          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
          xsi:schemaLocation="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace-1.1.xsd">
    <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html how to configure your webspace-->

    <name>sulu.ddev.site</name>
    <key>sulu</key>

    <localizations>
        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/localization.html how to add new localizations -->
        <localization language="en" default="true"/>
    </localizations>

    <default-templates>
        <default-template type="page">default</default-template>
        <default-template type="home">homepage</default-template>
    </default-templates>

    <!-- See: https://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html#excluded-templates-optional
    <excluded-templates>
        <excluded-template>other</excluded-template>
    </excluded-templates>
    -->

    <templates>

        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/cookbook/custom-error-page.html how to create a custom error page -->
        <template type="error">error/error</template>

    <navigation>

            <context key="main">

            <key>example</key>

            <environments>
                <environment type="prod">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>

                <environment type="stage">

        </portal>
    </portals>
</webspace>

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="utf-8"?>
<webspace xmlns="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace"
          xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance"
          xsi:schemaLocation="http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace http://schemas.sulu.io/webspace/webspace-1.1.xsd">
    <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html how to configure your webspace-->

    <name>sulu.ddev.site</name>
    <key>sulu</key>

    <localizations>
        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/localization.html how to add new localizations -->
        <localization language="en" default="true"/>
    </localizations>

    <default-templates>
        <default-template type="page">default</default-template>
        <default-template type="home">homepage</default-template>
    </default-templates>

    <!-- See: https://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/book/webspaces.html#excluded-templates-optional
    <excluded-templates>
        <excluded-template>other</excluded-template>
    </excluded-templates>
    -->

    <templates>
        <template type="search">search/search</template>
        <!-- See: http://docs.sulu.io/en/latest/cookbook/custom-error-page.html how to create a custom error page -->
        <template type="error">error/error</template>
    </templates>

    <navigation>
        <contexts>
            <context key="main">
                <meta>
                    <title lang="en">Main Navigation</title>
                    <title lang="de">Hauptnavigation</title>
                </meta>
            </context>
        </contexts>
    </navigation>

    <portals>
        <portal>
            <name>sulu.ddev.site</name>
            <key>sulu</key>

            <environments>
                <environment type="prod">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="stage">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="test">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
                <environment type="dev">
                    <urls>
                        <url language="en">{host}</url>
                    </urls>
                </environment>
            </environments>
        </portal>
    </portals>
</webspace>
